website_summaries.verdict: Funko has done the unthinkable by making R2-D2 even cuter. Star Wars fans will enjoy watching R2 bounce in place while it is firmly secured to its branded stand.
pros: This beloved droid’s body moves like a bobblehead toy, while its legs hold it in place
cons: has a unique shape when compared to other toys

customer_reviews.title: My 3yr old niece could paint better
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised with funko, whoever painted it must have been a 3yr old child bc the paint was everywhere. Disappointing. Also the R2 is much smaller than the avg funko doll.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oh

customer_reviews.title: RD-D2
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty disappointed with is product. The coloring is all out of the line and at some parts it’s already fading. I’m not even sure if this was a unused or returned. On the left side, rdd2 leg is not all the way in, making the whole figure look diagonal in a way. It’s really just for desk decoration, but I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Star Wars Collectable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cute POP R2-D2 figure for my son. He collects all things Star Wars and really loved this little addition to his collection. Arrived ahead of schedule and was packaged well. Great price. Will order again from this seller for sure!
customer_reviews.author: LisaC

customer_reviews.title: Great Funko product came perfectly packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Only place I could find R2 Funko and at such a great price. Got it with BB8, Last Jedi Rey, and Last Jedi Kylo for my nerdy girlfriend for Valentine's day she loved them. She's a big Funko collector....and yes she got roses sent to her at work...i'm not a moron ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Montello

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Got the whole collection as a gift for my husband. Good quality as usual, packaging was fine, no tears or dents in box upon shipping. We love Funko pops
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cute little droid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little artoo for a desk decoration at work, it has done its job as that perfectly. The whole body is a bobble while the legs are stationary, so when I have a bad call I can just bop it's head and it'll bounce. My artoo sits a little crookedly but nobody else has noticed the slight imperfection. Paint quality isn't the best but hey, it's a toy, not handmade.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing representation of R2. The colours are washed out, and my (new) own has one leg crooked. It seems like his legs weren't lined up on his stand, so they forced one leg into place. Not what I come to expect from Funko.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bickram

customer_reviews.title: Mini R2D2 So Cute
customer_reviews.text: Mini sized version of the most adorable yet misunderstood robot from the BEST all time cinematic series in my lifetime. I used to pretend and make up lines in my head of what he was saying to all of the characters. He is a little Squat and maybe a little too square for the figure but he is a bobblehead and it makes him so cute! If you want to start a collection of these FUN figures I can recommend starting here!
customer_reviews.author: Marilou70

customer_reviews.title: Kid favorite
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a relative who lives in another city. His mom said he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: beep boop <3
customer_reviews.text: I adore this little guy. He sits on my desk wth BB-8 and Claptrap (from Borderlands), which (along with my Dalek) round out my little robot crew. good quality material, some of the paint job could have been a bit more refined, I guess, but it's primarily a toy and it was super cheap so I'm not taking a star off for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amby

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Came waaaaayyy earlier than estimated, which was awesome because it’s a Christmas gift. As for the item itself I can’t really see anything wrong with the paint quality of the item at all, though it’s going to stay in the box so I can’t see every aspect of the droid. Very pleased with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love R2 POP toy
customer_reviews.text: Love R2 POP toy. I put it on my dashboard. It doesn't bob a whole lot since the springs are inside it's legs but it still looks super cool!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: My son is a huge R2-D2 fan. Finding this ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge R2-D2 fan. Finding this in stores was non-existent. I ordered this as part of his college graduation present so he could put it in his new office. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Avery

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I mean can you really go wrong with a funko pop, i think not. R2D2 is my favorite and this pop is so cute in person. love it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Great for any Star Wars fan
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who is a Ultra Star Wars fan. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: AnamCara

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 4yo who love Star Wars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4yo who love Star Wars. Great bargain compared to Legos or other Star Wars action figures - price is good, sturdy product, larger than legos=harder to lose, even if the base gets lost, R2 can still stand up. Would buy again and am purchasing more Funko Pop Star Wars figures.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Cute R2D2!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm just a Star Wars freak, and this little R2D2 is cute! Nice quality plastic and with a lot of details. It was intact and the details are nicely done. I gave this as a present and my son loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Loo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and was packaged nicely. The reason for the 4 stars was because ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was packaged nicely. The reason for the 4 stars was because of the paint job. There was a huge blob on the top and the detailing on the front isn't the best... it's kind of blurry. But it still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Grear price really good product
customer_reviews.text: Great price good quality. A must have for a Starwars bublehead collection
customer_reviews.author: Jose E Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this for my mom for Christmas & she loved it. I didn't even know it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom for Christmas & she loved it. I didn't even know it was a bobble head when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but doesn't "bobble"
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for someone who loves Star Wars, and she absolutely loves the thing! The one negative about it is that R2 doesn't really 'bobble' much. The put the spring joints where his legs attach to the body. There is little room for the toy to move up and down, and absolutely no room for it to move side to side. Overall, it's a great item for the price. Just make sure you get it for the look and not the "bobble".
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift for my nephew. He lives it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for the Star Wars collector
customer_reviews.text: This R2-D2 unit was exactly as described. It's a great collectable for those Star Wars fans out there.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cook

customer_reviews.title: Get the clasics while their still around!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I have been slowly collecting these over the years. I love these Funko POP figures. They may not be like the old school collectable Star Wars toys but these are amazing none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Bearded Goalie

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: It was great! But the box of the product itself has scuffs and the plastic screen on the front is kind of bent in. But its fine, I'll deal with it. Its awesome so its good.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan C.

customer_reviews.title: Paint/color defects = (
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to receive this and then was quickly disappointed..craftsmanship on the piece was subpar to say the least. I returned it due to paint/color defects. = /
customer_reviews.author: Proud Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Poor paint
customer_reviews.text: Since the toy is basically decor, Its just a joke that the paint is so so so poorly done
customer_reviews.author: IVF

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This little R2D2 is adorable and a great addition to my desk, but as soon as I took him out of the box I saw he has a broken spring or something inside and leans forward. Not bad enough to return, but definitely a real bummer :-/
customer_reviews.author: Kim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for a friend who love star wars
customer_reviews.text: This isn't for me, but a gift for a friend who's a die hard Star wars buff, so he'll definitely would love this
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: love the funko and part of the collection
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE DROID YOU SEEK! love the funko and part of the collection! great purchase never disappoints
customer_reviews.author: AJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: *wave of hand* This is the droid you're looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Do you need your droid companion to help you study or work ? Yeah you do. Buy it.. trust the force.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Grigorian

customer_reviews.title: Cutie R2-D2!
customer_reviews.text: Love Funko Pops. This was a gift for my son, along with the C-3PO; though once I saw them I wanted to keep them because they are so adorable.
customer_reviews.author: cleosmom

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift to decorate an office space it looks great and people give lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to decorate an office space it looks great and people give lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift for a geeky husband! Good quality. Instead of a bobble head style it moves in an up and down motion. Very cute movement!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Can withstand a 6 year old. Great rewards for good behavior.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. We love the funky-pop. My 6 year daughter loves them and they get a lot of abuse and don't break. Be aware the base does come but it's supposed to. Almost gave my wife a heart attack though.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: but I really like it. Looks good next to my BB8
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be ugly from the pictures, but I really like it. Looks good next to my BB8.
customer_reviews.author: darthgumby

customer_reviews.title: WRONG FUNKO
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue original R2 D2 funko pop box and figure as shown on the display picture. But received the black one instead. don’t want it.
customer_reviews.author: Nah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves it and was very excited to add it to her collection. R2D2 > BB8!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tarryl

customer_reviews.title: A square-headed R2D2
customer_reviews.text: This one is on my desk with a few others. We made but I wish the curves were more rounded. It sort of looks like a share-headed R2D2.

customer_reviews.title: R2-D2
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift. My friend was very pleased. Probably will never come out of the box as he collects them.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! My son collects these and just loves them
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My son collects these and just loves them. Came super quick. Perfect collectors item! Get them all bc someday they may put your kids through college~

customer_reviews.title: The paint job is of poor quality and material is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine and the quality is not what I expected. The paint job is of poor quality and material is not sturdy. Considering sending it back.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What is there not to love about Starwars and R@-D2? Love it.

customer_reviews.title: perfect :)
customer_reviews.text: My pop came in perfect condition, both the box and the figure!Paint job was great, vVery happy with it as it's very cute :)

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: All Star Wars pops are bobble heads. R2 has two pivot points and one was broken in the box. Seller immediately replaced with a new one.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My brother is a Star Wars fanatic, this is his first Funko figure.

customer_reviews.title: Funky POP's are TOPS!
customer_reviews.text: Funky POP's are our favorite collectibles and a character from Star Wars makes a perfect addition.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken inside box. This was not the droid I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: R2-D2 was broken in the box. It arrived with some other Funkos and they were not broken so this must either be a handling issue at Amazon or Funko gave me a bum product. The figure is cute but I have no ability to evaluate its "bobble" quality as the body of the droid was broken off from its "arms." Very disappointing - I've been having bad luck with Funko Pop's quality, therefore if I continue to get any I'm going to get them in a store where I can evaluate quality before I buy.

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed

The square which are on the back of it are not straight lines at all. It has two different types of white, the legs are whiter than the body, there is a blue drop of pain on the right leg, it looks dirty and as if someone else has returned it. Going to send it back

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I got this on lightning deal for like $4, so for that I cannot complain. However, if I had paid any more that that I would be a bit disappointed. The craftsmanship is a bit poor and the bobble feature is weak at best. If you can find this on special for $4 or so I'd say go for it, anything above that it isn't worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: For the boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend. He is a Star Wars fanatic and loves all things R2. R2 doesn't have much of a bobble to him, but it is a cute size and fun to look at. My boyfriend was happy with it. We are not serious collectors and this was just a fun little something to add to the bookshelf of "decorations"
customer_reviews.author: THarpestad

product_meta.title: POP Star Wars: R2-D2
product_meta.description:
From that little known movie series Star Wars, your favorite droid has been given the vinyl figure bobble head treatment with this Star Wars R2-D2 Pop. Vinyl Bobble Head. R2 stands 3 3/4-Inch tall and makes a great gift for children and adult collectors alike.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From that little known movie series Star Wars, your favorite droid has been given the vinyl figure bobble head treatment with this Star Wars R2-D2 Pop. Vinyl Bobble Head. R2 stands 3 3/4-inches tall, and makes a great gift for children and adult collectors alike.
feature_bullets: STAR WARS CHILDHOOD FAVORITE CHARACTER - From that little known movie series Star Wars, your favorite droid has been given the vinyl figure bobble head treatment with this Star Wars R2-D2 Pop.
DESIGNER TOYS - Inspired by designer toys and stylized character collectibles the world over, Funko is back with Pop Vinyl Bobble Heads.
COLLECT THEM ALL - Bring home your favorite classic Star Wars character from a galaxy far, far away. makes a great collector item for both children and adult collectors alike.
STAND UP SIZE - R2-D2 Pop! Vinyl Bobble Head! Standing on top of a display base, this figure measures 3.75-inches tall.
PERFECT GIFT - This toy is perfect gift for children’s 3 years and above, best for occasions like birthdays, achievements, Christmas and makes great idea for collection.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars870 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
